name: Enter the Wormhole
description:
Enter the Wormhole is a Sci-Fi fantasy survival game where “you” as the player travels through a time warp in space and wakes up on a exoplanet. Encounter bizarre creatures as you explore while you learn to survive. Will you be able to find a way to escape? There’s only one way to find out.

Note:

This game is build on Unity 2017.1.0 and most its assets (some are from Unity's free tutorials e.g. game UI) are made using Google Blocks. The intention is to show that it is not necessary to have fancy assets (usually paid ones) from the asset store when something like Google Blocks or similar are available (especially when there isn't time to use/learn Maya, Substance, etc..) and using Unity's effects setting could easily create an interesting game in a short time. 

Navmesh is what allows enemies and neutral creatures to move about. This is perhaps the fastest way to implement AI behaviour. 

This is the game source code.
